div.p:
... the eighteen paṭṭiṉams ..., the thirty-two vēḷāpuṟamsDivergent readings., the sixty-four ... whereas the rightuous sceptre was in front of us ..., whereas the deity ... We, the people of the eighteen lands patiṉ-eṇ-viṣaiyattōmum, which comprises all the worlds in the four directions, ... that is:
We, the one thousand five hundred of the shining directions, in Eṭṭaivaṭṭai and Iṭaivaṭṭai,
We, the one thousand five hundred of the shining directions, in Ēṟucāttu and Iraṅkucāttu,
We, the one thousand five hundred of the shining directions, ...,
this is the taṉma-camaiya-k-kāriyam that we made ...
This is the manner in which we have given ...
